mapper.sql: serial_number, account_number, organ_name, organ_class, member_grade, member_overtime, organ_address, detail_address, organ_phone, organ_man, organ_manphone, organ_hava, reserve_field1, reserve_dield2
mapper.select:
select
from js_sys_member where 1=1
and DATE(member_overtime) >= DATE(#{startTime})
and DATE(member_overtime) <= DATE(#{endTime})
and organ_name like '%${organName}%'
and member_grade = #{memberGrade}
mapper.insert: insert into js_sys_member (serial_number, account_number, organ_name, organ_class, member_grade, member_overtime, organ_address, detail_address, organ_phone, organ_man, organ_manphone, organ_hava, reserve_field1, reserve_dield2) values (#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{memberOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organManphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organHava,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserveDield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update js_sys_member
account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_name = #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_class = #{organClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=CHAR},
member_overtime = #{memberOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organ_address = #{organAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update js_sys_member set account_number = #{accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_name = #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_class = #{organClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_grade = #{memberGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, member_overtime = #{memberOvertime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_address = #{organAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail_address = #{detailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_phone = #{organPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_man = #{organMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_manphone = #{organManphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ_hava = #{organHava,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_field1 = #{reserveField1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve_dield2 = #{reserveDield2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
